      • setEdited

        public void setEdited​(User editor,
                      java.util.Date date)
        Defines the user and time of the latest change to the item's value. This method should be called whenever the value of the item is changed, to ensure accurate information of its change
        Parameters:
        editor - - A reference of the User that last changed the value
        date - - A reference of the Date that states the time it was changed

      • setLocked

        public void setLocked​(boolean lockState)
        Sets an item as locked or unlocked
        Parameters:
        lockState - New state for the item (True locks the item, False unlocks the item)
